name: Jabra SPEAK 510 for PC - VoIP desktop speakerphone - Bluetooth - wireless, wired | Dell USA
description: The Speak 510 is a personal, easy to use conference call speakerphone with both - USB and Bluetooth connectivity, for efficient and productive conference calls whenever and wherever. With an optional Jabra link 370 USB adapter* that gives you wireless freedom up to 100 feet /30 meters. Comes with a protective travel pouch.
